parameters{
	DaysToLoad as integer
}
source(output(
		OccupationID as integer,
		BOSOccupationCode as string,
		OccupationSortOrder as integer,
		OccupationDescription as string,
		OccupationDescriptionShort as string,
		IsActiveFlag as boolean,
		CreateDate as timestamp,
		CreateUser as string,
		LastUpdate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateUser as string,
		UpdateStamp as binary,
		DescriptionResourceKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> ODSlkpOccupation
source(output(
		OccupationKey as integer,
		OccupationName as string,
		Hash as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SourceSystem as string,
		OccupationID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> DimOccupation
ODSlkpOccupation filter(toDate(LastUpdate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastUpdate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(OccupationID)) ~> DaysToLoad
DaysToLoad select(mapColumn(
		OccupationID,
		OccupationDescription,
		IsActiveFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
CustomColumns derive(Hash = sha2(256, concat(OccupationDescription, SourceSystem))) ~> Hash
SelectColumns derive(DWH_CreatedDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp(),
		SourceSystem = 'Conect',
		OccupationName = trim(OccupationDescription)) ~> CustomColumns
DimOccupation select(mapColumn(
		Hash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectHash
Hash, SelectHash exists(Hash@Hash == SelectHash@Hash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
Hash, SelectHash exists(Hash@Hash == SelectHash@Hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OccupationKey as integer,
		OccupationName as string,
		Hash as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SourceSystem as string,
		OccupationID as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Hash'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OccupationName,
		Hash,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		IsActive = IsActiveFlag,
		SourceSystem,
		OccupationID
	)) ~> UpdateDimOccupation
NotExists sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OccupationKey as integer,
		OccupationName as string,
		Hash as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SourceSystem as string,
		OccupationID as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OccupationName,
		Hash,
		DWH_CreatedDate,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		IsActive = IsActiveFlag,
		SourceSystem,
		OccupationID
	)) ~> InsertDimOccupation

		CustomerKey = iifNull(CustomerKey,-1),
		CustomerID = ClientGUID,
		CenterKey = iifNull(CenterKey, -1),
		CenterID = SelectColumns@CenterID,

		Member1_ID_Temp = Member1_ID_Temp,

		CustomerMembershipContractPaidAmount = iif(isNull(ContractPaidAmount), toFloat(0) , toFloat(ContractPaidAmount) ),
		CustomerMembershipMonthlyFee = iif(isNull(MonthlyFee), toFloat(0) , toFloat(MonthlyFee) ),
		CustomerMembershipBeginDateKey = iifNull(DateKeyBegin, 1),
		CustomerMembershipBeginDate = FullDateBegin,
		CustomerMembershipEndDateKey = iifNull(DateKeyEnd, -1),
		CustomerMembershipEndDate = FullDateEnd,
		CustomerMembershipCancelDateKey = iifNull(DateKeyCancel, -1),
		CustomerMembershipCancelDate = CancelDate,
		CustomerMembershipCancelReasonID = MembershipCancelReasonID,
		CustomerMembershipCancelReasonName = initCap(MembershipCancelReasonDescription),
		CustomerMembershipIdentifier = ClientMembershipIdentifier,
		NationalMonthlyFee = iif(isNull(NationalMonthlyFee), toFloat(0) , toFloat(NationalMonthlyFee) ),
		CustomerMembershipCreateDate = CreateDate,
		CustomerMembershipLastUpdateDate = LastUpdate,
		IsActive = IsActiveFlag,

	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists
